title: santhoshkandy
author: santhoshkandy
content: PuppyLand V2(BNB Miner) is designed for individuals who want to earn bnb in a secured way. . Dogs(Miners) can be viewed as internal tokens whose value rises and falls based on the combined actions of the community, just like any other coin or token that you may hold. But, unlike your average coins and tokens, PuppyLand V2(BNB Miner) allows you to stabilize and increase your TVL by taking long-term advantage of its compound(breed dogs) feature.TVL is your current estimated "total value locked", an estimated value of your total miners(Dogs). Once Dogs(miners) are hired, they work for you indefinitely, therefore your TVL can not be withdrawn in one lump sum. When you buy Dogs (miners) , they will give you puppies which you can sell them and earn BNB throughout the day with an estimated daily total of upto 15% of your TVL. You can breed Dogs (compound the BNB accumulated ) in your account at any time. Pocketing too often will ensure a decrease in TVL, which in turn will ensure a decrease in your daily payouts. The value of miners continuously increases and decreases throughout the day, therefore it is normal to see your personal TVL fluctuating as your bnb(puppies) continues to fill.SustainabilityPuppyLand V2(BNB Miner) is sustained by continued community support, just like every other crypto coin, token or project. The difference is, PuppyLand V2(BNB Miner) also has an algorithm that doesn't allow others to instantly dump their coins on the community.PuppyLand V2(BNB Miner) also allows you to stabilize and increase your TVL by taking long-term advantage of its compound feature.ConclusionPuppyLand V2 is a Bnb miner app which generates you 10% - 15% bnb daily bnb returns on your invested bnb..and for referrals you get 15% bnb bonus. How it works:login to the website and buy dogs(miners) with your bnb and for every minute you will get puppies(bnb) as rewards. Then click on sell puppies . Immediately puppies (daily rewards) will be converted into bnb and will be sent your wallet using smart contract. Daily returns 10%-15% and referral bonus 15%details :website : https://puppyland.apptwitter  : https://twitter.com/puppylandappTelegram : https://t.me/puppylandofficialwhitepaper : https://puppyland.app/static/media/puppyland%20whitepaper.pdf
